Hero.title: Fresh Fruits & Vegetables from Morocco to the World
Hero.subtitle: Premium quality produce directly from our farms in Agadir.

About.title: Our Legacy
About.subtitle: Quality Rooted in European Standards
About.description: SARL HOUKMI EXPORT was founded by Mr. Houkmi Ahmed, a former Quality Inspector for the European Commission, alongside his daughter, Imene Houkmi. With over 35 years of combined experience, this unique leadership ensures that every shipment meets the strictest European quality standards.
About.sub_description: We simply don't just trade; we ensure excellence. Partnering with top-tier farms and packing stations across Agadir, we offer fully customizable packaging solutions and maintain a rigorous cold chain in our dedicated warehousing facilities to ensure freshness.
About.mission: To provide unbeatable prices without compromising on quality, bridging the gap between Moroccan producers and European markets (France, Italy, and beyond).
About.imageCaption: Mr. Houkmi Ahmed and Imene Houkmi - A legacy of quality

Gallery.description: A glimpse into our farms, packing facilities, and the dedicated team ensuring quality in every box.

Contact.title: Request a Quote

Contact.name: Full Name

Footer.description: Bringing the freshest fruits and vegetables from Morocco to your table. Quality and reliability since 1990.

ProductDetails.tomatoes_description: Our premium tomatoes are grown in the fertile soils of Agadir, Morocco. Harvested at peak ripeness, they offer exceptional flavor, vibrant color, and firm texture. Perfect for fresh consumption, salads, or processing.
ProductDetails.oranges_description: Sweet, juicy oranges from Morocco's sun-drenched groves. Our oranges are known for their perfect balance of sweetness and acidity, making them ideal for fresh juice or direct consumption. Packed with vitamin C and natural goodness.
ProductDetails.peppers_description: Crisp, colorful peppers grown with care in our Moroccan farms. Available in multiple varieties, our peppers are known for their freshness, crunch, and vibrant colors. Ideal for cooking, grilling, or fresh salads.
peppers_features: Rich in vitamins A and C
ProductDetails.watermelons_description: Juicy, sweet watermelons grown under the Moroccan sun. Our watermelons are carefully selected for their sweetness, crisp texture, and vibrant red flesh. Perfect for hot summer days and a healthy, refreshing treat.

oranges_specs.varieties: Clementine, Nour, Maroc Late, Washington Navel

ProductDetails.calabacin_description: Our zucchini are grown in controlled environments to ensure a perfectly straight shape and vibrant green skin. Harvested daily to maintain maximum crunch.
ProductDetails.cantaloupe_description: Fragrant and sweet Cantaloupe melons. These melons are selected for their distinct netted rind and deep orange, honey-like flesh.
ProductDetails.melon_description: Nurtured under the Moroccan sun, our yellow melons offer a refreshingly sweet flavor and smooth texture. Known for their durability during transport.
ProductDetails.alubias_description: Premium flat green beans (Alubias). These beans are hand-selected for their length, width, and absence of strings, perfect for traditional European stews.
ProductDetails.judias_description: Round, fine green beans (Jud√≠as). Meticulously sorted to ensure uniform thickness and a satisfying 'snap' when broken. A staple for gourmet presentation.
